original_title: Berryz工房 First Live in Bangkok
overview: Berryz Koubou's concert held on March 27, 2010 at the Indoor Stadium Hua Mak Sports Complex in Bangkok, Thailand. The DVD was sold only to fan club members in September 2010, but was also pre-sold in limited quantities on August 21, 2010 at their 2010 summer tour.
title: Berryz Kobo First Live in Bangkok
